name: Tracker
description: Tracks pitch and envelope of an audio signal, outputting as CVs. Can generate harmony chords (as pitch CVs or pitch shift CVs). Supports microtonal tuning (Scala/MTS). Based on disting EX algorithm.

parameters.name: Range
parameters.description: Sets the range of pitches which can be tracked. Set appropriately for the lowest expected note.

parameters.name: Track bias
parameters.description: Internal pitch tracking parameter to help avoid octave errors.

parameters.name: Track bias
parameters.description: Signal threshold (dB) below which pitch tracking is disabled.

parameters.name: Harmony mode
parameters.description: Sets the harmony generation mode. 'MIDI' uses external MIDI notes.

parameters.name: MIDI channel
parameters.description: MIDI channel for receiving notes if Harmony mode is 'MIDI' (0=off).

parameters.name: Force in tune
parameters.description: If on, chord pitches are absolutely in tune. If off, they follow tracked audio pitch bends.

parameters.name: Input
parameters.description: The audio input bus.

parameters.name: Pitch output
parameters.description: The pitch CV output bus.

parameters.name: Pitch output mode
parameters.description: Add/Replace mode for the pitch CV output.

parameters.name: Env output
parameters.description: The envelope CV output bus.

parameters.name: Env output mode
parameters.description: Add/Replace mode for the envelope CV output.

parameters.name: Chord 1 output
parameters.description: The pitch CV output bus for the first chord note.

parameters.name: Chord 1 output mode
parameters.description: Add/Replace mode for the first chord note CV output.

parameters.name: Chord 2 output
parameters.description: The pitch CV output bus for the second chord note.

parameters.name: Chord 2 output mode
parameters.description: Add/Replace mode for the second chord note CV output.

parameters.name: Chord 3 output
parameters.description: The pitch CV output bus for the third chord note.

parameters.name: Chord 3 output mode
parameters.description: Add/Replace mode for the third chord note CV output.

parameters.name: Chord 4 output
parameters.description: The pitch CV output bus for the fourth chord note.

parameters.name: Chord 4 output mode
parameters.description: Add/Replace mode for the fourth chord note CV output.

parameters.name: Shift 1 output
parameters.description: The pitch shift CV output bus for the first pitch shifter.

parameters.name: Shift 1 output mode
parameters.description: Add/Replace mode for the first pitch shifter CV output.

parameters.name: Shift 2 output
parameters.description: The pitch shift CV output bus for the second pitch shifter.

parameters.name: Shift 2 output mode
parameters.description: Add/Replace mode for the second pitch shifter CV output.

parameters.name: Shift 3 output
parameters.description: The pitch shift CV output bus for the third pitch shifter.

parameters.name: Shift 3 output mode
parameters.description: Add/Replace mode for the third pitch shifter CV output.

parameters.name: this appropriately for the lowest note that you need to track. Track bias
parameters.description: An internal parameter of the pitch tracking

parameters.name: 0 2 0 Sets the harmony mode - one of 'Shape', 'SATB', or 'MIDI'. The first two are the standard modes described in the polysynth documentation. The last uses MIDI notes provided to the algorithm to directly set the chord notes. MIDI channel
parameters.description: Sets the MIDI channel on which to receive notes if

parameters.name: 0 1 0 The standard Add/Replace mode selector as described above, for the pitch CV output. Env output
parameters.description: The envelope CV output bus.
